BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>🐛 Bug</denchmark-h>
 
 One can return invisible keypoints by setting remove_invisible flag to False as follows
 <denchmark-code>augmentor = albu.Compose([...], keypoint_params={'format': 'xy', 'remove_invisible': False})
 </denchmark-code>
 
 However, due to this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/albu/albumentations/blob/master/albumentations/core/composition.py#L216>check</denchmark-link>
 , those invisible keypoints result in an error. Note that,  flag which supposed to be conditioned on  flag is always .
 Will submit a fix following up this bug report.
 Best.
